metadata.title: CVE-2023-1936 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.7 before 15.11.10, all versions starting from 16.0 before16.0.6, all versions starting from 16.1 before 16.1.1, which allows anattacker to leak the email address of a user who created a service deskissue.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
